alert.note: Alert for Converse; Niobrara; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 9:18PM MDT until September 09 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL NIOBRARA...NORTHWESTERN PLATTE AND SOUTHEASTERN CONVERSE COUNTIES... At 917 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Douglas, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Niobrara, northwestern Platte and southeastern Converse Counties, including the following locations... Lost Springs. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 112 and 134. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
